title: Estaba pensando...
body:
¿Y si decidieran hacer una película de Hogwarts Mystery?

Porque, sinceramente, yo los veo capaces. No digo si seria buena o mala idea, solo digo que los veo capaces.

Es que ya estoy viendo, en unos años, cuando las películas de Animales Fantásticos acaben, ver un anuncio “Próxima película de Harry Potter: Hogwarts Mystery” o algo así. 

Y si no es de Hogwarts Mystery, de Harry Potter: Wizards Unite, el juego que sale el año que viene xd

tags: why do i do this to myself
I KNEW THIS WAS GONNA HAPPEN
summary: y’know when you’re looking for a good fic and one seems really interesting.... and then it hasn’t been updated in like two...
body:
y’know when you’re looking for a good fic and one seems really interesting…. and then it hasn’t been updated in like two years, but you try it out anyway

& then the writing is amazing, you just can’t stop, n BAM all chapters read and now you’re crying ‘coz there won’t ever be more.

I did this to myself.

reblog.comment:

title: Ahh The Crimes of Grindlewald
body:
What can I say about this massive clusterfuck of a movie? Even if I could forgive the problematic portrayal of POC, or the fact that all the women are basically just window dressing, or the CONTINUOUS and BLATANT retconning of established canon, this movie was just … bad.

It was boring, slow paced, confusing and unnecessarily convoluted. I spent most of the time confused as to what was actually happening, where everyone was and why. The entire movie was based around a red herring that had no real payoff. Most of the characters didn’t need to be there. The whole Nagini thing is … confusing because considering the amount of rage it has generated in the fandom, she does … literally nothing. Why? Was she? There?

The titular “Fantastic Beasts” are awkwardly shoe-horned into a movie that has nothing to do with them, Newt seems to have been transplanted from an enjoyable romp of a movie into this grimdark shitheap without having got the memo that we’re not supposed to be enjoying ourselves. I struggled to believe the relationship between Dumbledore and Grindlewald, however tangentally it was referenced. The whole thing was just over long, needlessly convoluted, and unnescessary.

About the only thing I can say in its favour is that Jude Law is charming as fucking ever, Eddie Redmayne is still quite sweet as Newt, even though he doesn’t fit into this movie at all, and the Hogwarts theme still gave me chills.

I hated it.

summary:
WORTHY ENOUGH

 lord voldemort has lured fenrir greyback and his savage pack into doing his bidding, but across the Irish sea...
caption:
WORTHY ENOUGH

lord voldemort has lured fenrir greyback and his savage pack into doing his bidding, but across the Irish sea is an untapped resource: a community of werewolves desperate for shelter and security, and to live quiet lives in the shadows. those on the front lines of the war have other plans, and to remain neutral will be a guaranteed struggle.

this and more on halys, a member-driven au marauders jcink site, set in mid-1980 at the height of the first wizarding war. we’re gearing up for a major site event, so now is the perfect time to join our community & build our AU from the ground up!

→ INDEX | GUIDEBOOK | CANON LIST | REQUESTS |SUBPLOT: WEREWOLF ALLEGIANCES

blog.name: bitingdownpromo
blog.title: Biting Down
blog.description: The year is 2027. The wizarding community is tearing itself apart as danger lurks around every corner; the possibility of a wizarding epidemic sends the community into a frenzy that brings a new evil to power. Will you fight for what you believe, or take the path of least resistance?

summary:
the electronics of your heart...
 The year is 2028. After an incendiary article from Rita Skeeter reporting an increase in...
caption:
the electronics of your heart…

The year is 2028. After an incendiary article from Rita Skeeter reporting an increase in squib births, the wizarding world is tossed into chaos concerning the loss of magical heritage. The renegades vow to protect what’s left of magical blood without caring about the damage along the way. More and more wixen go missing, including the Weasleys’ own Dominique. The Ministry fights within itself as Percy Weasley and Hermione Granger battle for the position of Minister of Magic, tearing the fabric holding wizarding society together.

see how fast they fall apart…

Will you fight for what you believe, or take the path of least resistance? Whether you flee or bite down and take the heat, the next great war is coming and the outcome is up to you. Welcome to Biting Down.

home | plot | rules | wanted connections | character suggestions | application

Our roleplay currently has many canon characters available, such as Rose Weasley, Louis Weasley, Albus Potter, Scorpius Malfoy, and both Scamander twins. We also welcome original characters, with lots of surnames available from canon!
